question: Goa International Airports get the loan amount of _____________ crore from Axis Bank for developing Mopa airport.
explanation: Goa International Airports Limited, a subsidiary of GMR Airports has executed a debt facility agreement for the development of Greenfield airport at Mopa. The entire debt of Rs. 1,330 crore was underwritten by Axis Bank on a long tenor door to door basis of 18 years on competitive terms.s
